TextView.android:text: The Snake bite detection App allows you to capture or select an image and classify it using a pre-trained machine learning model. The app provides real-time predictions on the captured or selected image, giving you insights into the content of the image.

2.1. Installation: Download and install the Snake bite detection App from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store.\n\n2.2. Launching the App: Open the app from your device's home screen or app drawer.

The Snake bite detection App follows the following workflow:

1. Capture or Select Image: On the main screen, you can either capture an image using your device's camera or select an image from your device's gallery.

2. Image Classification: After capturing or selecting an image, the app will process the image using a machine learning model. It will provide real-time predictions based on the content of the image.

3. View Result: The app will display the classification result on the screen, indicating the predicted category or label of the image.

4. Additional Information: Depending on the predicted result, you can access additional information related to the classification result. The app provides specific information for certain categories or labels.
